text.text_translated: Julie Wong is a top researcher in the fields of Robotics and AI. Robotics is the study of how to design and build robots. AI, or Artificial Intelligence, is about making computers think like humans. She has written over 50 scientific papers by herself or with other experts. Her work is in important magazines where other scientists check the articles. She also often speaks at big meetings with scientists. They come from all over the world. In 2012, she received a very important prize for her work. It was from a top science organization. Julie lives with her family in a smart home that she designed herself.
